posts.post_content:
Opponent plays this. You kick a [Rite of Replication](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rite of Replication), and proceed to barf your deck's lands all over the battlefield.  
  
Yes, this has happened before. And yes, punches were thrown.

posts.post_content:
Ridiculous. Just ridiculous. 6 mana 6/6 trampler is good on its face, and then you have a comes into play ability, plus an on attack ability that is beyond amazing. Searching for any land, any land at all, allows so many things to work that would not otherwise. Especially alongside a land heavy deck like Zendikar.  
  
You have to question R&D's sanity printing a card like this.
posts.html:

Searching for any land, any land at all, allows so many things to work that would not otherwise. Especially alongside a land heavy deck like Zendikar.

You have to question R&D's sanity printing a card like this.

posts.post_content:
I tried this in a [Mayael the Anima](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mayael the Anima) EDH deck, and one game he actually managed to get me more creatures than Mayael herself did, via hideaway lands. Plus, of course, all of the fatties I was able to hardcast via [Gaea's Cradle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Gaea's Cradle).  
  
[Just searching for two basic lands and putting them in tapped](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=247345) is worth ![3](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=3&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol); for just ![1](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=1&type=symbol)![Green](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=G&type=symbol) more you can get nonbasics, and a huge beater, and the ability to search for more each turn. That's an incredible bargain.
posts.html:
I tried this in a Mayael the Anima EDH deck, and one game he actually managed to get me more creatures than Mayael herself did, via hideaway lands. Plus, of course, all of the fatties I was able to hardcast via Gaea's Cradle.

Just searching for two basic lands and putting them in tapped is worth ; for just more you can get nonbasics, and a huge beater, and the ability to search for more each turn. That's an incredible bargain.
